<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Accompany](/Feats.aspx?ID=1644) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
An ally within 30 feet Casts a Spell.

</column>

---

You use your performances to supplement an ally's spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spells. Attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check, using a [very high DC for the ally's level](/Rules.aspx?ID=552), and either spend a Focus Point (if the triggering spell is a focus spell) or expend a spell slot at least 1 level higher than the triggering spell. If you succeed at the Performance check, your ally's spell doesn't cost the Focus Point or spell slot.
name: Accompany
